mapper.sql: SELECT ps.settlement_date, pss.settlement_number, ps.settlement_use, pss.settlement_code, pss.settlement_name, pss.settlement_brand, pss.settlement_specifications, pss.settlement_company, pss.settlement_quantity, pss.settlement_price, pss.settlement_money, pss.settlement_deposit, pss.order_number, pss.settlement_subclass, ps.settlement_invoice, pss.settlement_money / ( 1 + fpb.finance_parameter_name * 0.01) settlementNoMoney, pss.settlement_price / ( 1 + fpb.finance_parameter_name * 0.01) settlementNoPrice FROM jr_purchase_settlement_schedule pss LEFT JOIN jr_purchase_settlement ps ON ( ps.settlement_numbers = pss.settlement_number ) LEFT JOIN jr_finance_parameters fpa ON ( ps.currency_id = fpa.id ) LEFT JOIN jr_finance_parameters fpb ON ( ps.tax_rate_id = fpb.id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND ps.settlement_supplier = #{purchaseSettlementSchedule.settlementSupplier} AND ps.settlement_invoice = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jr_purchase_settlement ( settlement_state, settlement_date, settlement_numbers, settlement_use, settlement_supplier, settlement_library, currency_id, tax_rate_id, settlement_invoice ) VALUES ( #{settlementState}, #{settlementDate}, #{settlementNumbers}, #{settlementUse}, #{settlementSupplier}, #{settlementLibrary}, #{currencyId}, #{taxRateId}, #{settlementInvoice} )

INSERT INTO jr_purchase_settlement_schedule ( settlement_code, settlement_name, settlement_specifications, settlement_quality, settlement_brand, settlement_company, settlement_quantity, settlement_price, settlement_money, settlement_category, settlement_subclass, settlement_remarks, settlement_number, settlement_deposit, order_number, whether_invoice ) VALUES ( #{settlementCode}, #{settlementName}, #{settlementSpecifications}, #{settlementQuality}, #{settlementBrand}, #{settlementCompany}, #{settlementQuantity}, #{settlementPrice}, #{settlementMoney}, #{settlementCategory}, #{settlementSubclass}, #{settlementRemarks}, #{settlementNumber}, #{settlementDeposit}, #{orderNumber}, #{whetherInvoice} )
mapper.select: SELECT pss.id, pss.settlement_code, pss.settlement_name, pss.settlement_specifications, pss.settlement_quality, pss.settlement_brand, pss.settlement_company, pss.settlement_quantity, pss.settlement_price, pss.settlement_money, pss.settlement_category, pss.settlement_subclass, pss.settlement_remarks, pss.settlement_number FROM jr_purchase_settlement_schedule pss WHERE pss.settlement_number = #{oddNumbers}
mapper.update: UPDATE jr_purchase_settlement set settlement_state = 4 WHERE id = #{ids}
UPDATE jr_purchase_settlement set settlement_state = 3 WHERE id = #{ids}

UPDATE jr_warehouse_storage set storage_state = 3 WHERE storage_coding = #{settlementNumbers}
UPDATE jr_purchase_refund set refund_state = 2 WHERE refund_number = #{settlementNumbers}
UPDATE jr_warehouse_storage set storage_state = 2 WHERE storage_coding = #{settlementNumbers}
mapper.select: SELECT ps.settlement_date, pss.settlement_number, ps.settlement_use, ps.settlement_supplier, wl.location_name settlementLibrary, pss.settlement_code, pss.settlement_name, pss.settlement_specifications, pss.settlement_brand, pss.settlement_company, fpa.finance_parameter_name currencyName, pss.settlement_quantity, pss.settlement_price, pss.settlement_money, pss.settlement_remarks FROM jr_purchase_settlement_schedule pss LEFT JOIN jr_purchase_settlement ps ON ( ps.settlement_numbers = pss.settlement_number ) LEFT JOIN jr_warehouse_location wl ON ( ps.settlement_library = wl.location_sorting ) LEFT JOIN jr_finance_parameters fpa ON ( ps.currency_id = fpa.id )

SELECT ps.settlement_date, pis.invoice_numbers, ps.settlement_supplier, pss.settlement_code, pss.settlement_name, pss.settlement_specifications, pss.settlement_quantity, pis.invoice_amount, (pis.invoice_amount - pss.settlement_quantity) notInvoice, pss.settlement_company, pss.settlement_price, pss.settlement_money FROM jr_purchase_settlement_schedule pss LEFT JOIN jr_purchase_settlement ps ON ( ps.settlement_numbers = pss.settlement_number ) LEFT JOIN jr_purchase_invoice_schedule pis ON ( pis.invoice_code = pss.settlement_number ) WHERE 1 = 1
